title: Lol fps drop from 110 to 50

embed.description: Below is a list of some of the new and updated features in Windows 10, version 1607 (also known as the Anniversary Update). Note: For release dates and servicing options for each version, see Windows 10 release information. In previous versions of the Windows 10 Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK), you had to install additional features for Windows ICD to run.

body: i updated windows 10 version 1607, then my league fps drop from 110^ to 50. I don't get it even I uninstall my windows updates, my league fps is still staying at 50 fps. Could you guys help me pls ^ ^

replies.body:
Version 1607 introduced some changes to the Xbox app that enabled the Game DVR feature by default. This may be what's causing your issue, so I recommend you [disable the feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) for now.

Let me know if you continue to have issues with your FPS.
I also have this problem with Windows update 1607. I tried everything and your solution works!!!! Thank you so much. Went from maxed at 60 fps to 200.
